title: Hack The Pony
content:
This font started off as some custom lettering I did for a friend (Zondag.pdf) & then later used again for an apology card for the colleague of another friend (Card.gif). Since I liked the R so much, I decided to make it into an entire font. I'm curious what you guys think of it.  
BTW: sorry for the pdf, I knòw how annoying those are in these threads ;-)

comments.content: I did several versions of a font VERY similar to yours. In fact the R was exactly the same. Probably many others did so as well. Nevertheless, I like this style (otherwise I wouldn’t have dealt with it).
